00004 void eol_draw_trail(eolTrail * trail,
00005                     eolFloat   radius,
00006                     eolBool    fade,
00007                     eolBool    taper)
00008 {
00009   int i;
00010   eolFloat fadeFactor = 1;
00011   eolFloat taperFactor = 1;
00012   eolFloat alpha = 1;
00013   eolOrientation head,tail;
00014   if (!trail)return;
00015   if (!trail->trail)return;
00016   if (trail->len <= 1)return;
00017   if (fade)fadeFactor = 0.75;
00018   if (taper)taperFactor = 0.75;
00019   i = 1;
00020   if (!eol_trail_get_nth(trail, 0, &head))return;
00021   while (eol_trail_get_nth(trail, i++, &tail))
00022   {
00023     eol_draw_line_3D(head.position,
00024                      tail.position,
00025                      radius,
00026                      head.color,
00027                      (alpha * head.alpha));
00028     radius *= taperFactor;
00029     alpha *= fadeFactor;
00030     memcpy(&head,&tail,sizeof(eolOrientation));
00031   }
00032 }

00034 void eol_draw_cirlce_3D(eolVec3D point,
00035                         eolFloat radius,
00036                         eolUint  segments,
00037                         eolVec3D color,
00038                         eolFloat alpha)
00039 {
00040   eolVec3D p1,p2;
00041   eolFloat step;
00042   int i;
00043   if (segments < 3)return;
00044   step = EOL_2PI / segments;
00045   glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00046   glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00047   glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00048   glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00049   glColor4f(color.x,color.y,color.z,alpha);
00050   glPushMatrix();
00051 
00052   glTranslatef(point.x,point.y,point.z);
00053   
00054   glBegin( GL_LINES );
00055   
00056   for (i = 0; i < segments;i++)
00057   {
00058     eol_vec3d_set_angle_by_radians(&p1,i * step);
00059     eol_vec3d_set_angle_by_radians(&p2,(i + 1) * step);
00060     p1.x *= radius;
00061     p1.y *= radius;
00062     p2.x *= radius;
00063     p2.y *= radius;
00064     glVertex3f(p1.x,p1.y,0);
00065     glVertex3f(p2.x,p2.y,0);
00066   }
00067   
00068   glEnd( );
00069   glPopMatrix();
00070   glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00071   glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00072   glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00073   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00074   
00075 }

00077 void eol_draw_dot_3D(eolVec3D point,
00078                      eolFloat radius,
00079                      eolVec3D color,
00080                      eolFloat alpha)
00081 {
00082   glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00083   glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00084   glColor4f(color.x,color.y,color.z,alpha);
00085   glPushMatrix();
00086   glEnable(GL_POINT_SMOOTH);
00087   glPointSize(radius);
00088   glBegin( GL_POINTS );
00089   glVertex3f(point.x,point.y,point.z);
00090   glEnd( );
00091   glPopMatrix();
00092   glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00093   glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00094 }

00096 void eol_draw_line_3D(eolVec3D p1,
00097                       eolVec3D p2,
00098                       eolFloat radius,
00099                       eolVec3D color,
00100                       eolFloat alpha)
00101 {
00102   glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00103   glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00104   glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00105   glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00106   glColor4f(color.x,color.y,color.z,alpha);
00107   glPushMatrix();
00108 
00109   glLineWidth(1 + radius);
00110 
00111   glBegin( GL_LINES );
00112   glVertex3f(p1.x,p1.y,p1.z);
00113   glVertex3f(p2.x,p2.y,p2.z);
00114   glEnd( );
00115 
00116   glLineWidth(1);
00117 
00118   glPopMatrix();
00119   glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00120   glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00121   glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00122   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00123 }

00136   glPushMatrix();

00138   glVertex3f(p1.x,p1.y,p1.z);
00139   glVertex3f(p2.x,p2.y,p2.z);
00140   glVertex3f(p3.x,p3.y,p3.z);
00141   glEnd( );
00142   
00143   glPopMatrix();
00144   glColor4f(1,1,1,1);

00151 void eol_draw_rect_3D(eolRectFloat rect, eolOrientation ori)
00152 {
00153   glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00154   glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00155   glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00156   glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00157   glColor4f(ori.color.x,ori.color.y,ori.color.z,ori.alpha);
00158   glPushMatrix();
00159 
00160   glTranslatef(ori.position.x,ori.position.y,ori.position.z);
00161   glRotatef(ori.rotation.x, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00162   glRotatef(ori.rotation.y, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00163   glRotatef(ori.rotation.z, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00164   glScalef(ori.scale.x,ori.scale.y,ori.scale.z);
00165   
00166   
00167   glBegin( GL_LINES );
00168 
00169   glVertex3f(rect.x,rect.y,0);
00170   glVertex3f(rect.x + rect.w,rect.y,0);
00171   
00172   glVertex3f(rect.x + rect.w,rect.y,0);
00173   glVertex3f(rect.x + rect.w,rect.y + rect.h,0);
00174 
00175   glVertex3f(rect.x + rect.w,rect.y + rect.h,0);
00176   glVertex3f(rect.x,rect.y + rect.h,0);
00177 
00178   glVertex3f(rect.x,rect.y + rect.h,0);
00179   glVertex3f(rect.x,rect.y,0);
00180   glEnd( );
00181   
00182   glPopMatrix();
00183   glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00184   glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00185   glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00186   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00187 }

00189 void eol_draw_rect(eolRect rect,eolVec3D color,eolFloat alpha)
00190 {
00191     eolVec3D pos,pos2;
00192   eolGraphicsView view;
00193 
00194   glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00195   glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00196   glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00197   glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00198   glColor4f(color.x,color.y,color.z,alpha);
00199   
00200   eol_graphics_get_view(&view);
00201   eol_opengl_get_gl_coordinate(
00202       rect.x,
00203       rect.y,
00204       EOL_2DPLANE_,
00205       view.modelView,
00206       view.projection,
00207       view.viewPort,
00208       &pos.x,
00209       &pos.y,
00210       &pos.z
00211   );
00212 
00213   eol_opengl_get_gl_coordinate(
00214       rect.x + rect.w,
00215       rect.y + rect.h,
00216       EOL_2DPLANE_,
00217       view.modelView,
00218       view.projection,
00219       view.viewPort,
00220       &pos2.x,
00221       &pos2.y,
00222       &pos2.z
00223   );
00224 
00225   glPushMatrix();
00226   
00227   glBegin( GL_LINES );
00228   glVertex3f(pos.x,pos.y,pos.z);
00229   glVertex3f(pos2.x,pos.y,pos.z);
00230   
00231   glVertex3f(pos2.x,pos.y,pos.z);
00232   glVertex3f(pos2.x,pos2.y,pos.z);
00233   
00234   glVertex3f(pos2.x,pos2.y,pos.z);
00235   glVertex3f(pos.x,pos2.y,pos.z);
00236 
00237   glVertex3f(pos.x,pos2.y,pos.z);
00238   glVertex3f(pos.x,pos.y,pos.z);
00239   glEnd( );
00240 
00241   glPopMatrix();
00242   glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00243   glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00244   glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00245   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00246 
00247 }

00249 void eol_draw_solid_rect(eolRect rect,eolVec3D color,eolFloat alpha)
00250 {
00251   eolVec3D pos,pos2;
00252   eolGraphicsView view;
00253 
00254   glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00255   glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00256   glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00257   glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00258   glColor4f(color.x,color.y,color.z,alpha);
00259   
00260   eol_graphics_get_view(&view);
00261   eol_opengl_get_gl_coordinate(
00262       rect.x,
00263       rect.y,
00264       EOL_2DPLANE_,
00265       view.modelView,
00266       view.projection,
00267       view.viewPort,
00268       &pos.x,
00269       &pos.y,
00270       &pos.z
00271   );
00272 
00273   eol_opengl_get_gl_coordinate(
00274       rect.x + rect.w,
00275       rect.y + rect.h,
00276       EOL_2DPLANE_,
00277       view.modelView,
00278       view.projection,
00279       view.viewPort,
00280       &pos2.x,
00281       &pos2.y,
00282       &pos2.z
00283   );
00284 
00285   glPushMatrix();
00286   
00287   glBegin( GL_QUADS );
00288   glVertex3f(pos.x,pos.y,pos.z);
00289   glVertex3f(pos2.x,pos.y,pos.z);
00290   glVertex3f(pos2.x,pos2.y,pos.z);
00291   glVertex3f(pos.x,pos2.y,pos.z);
00292   glEnd( );
00293 
00294   glPopMatrix();
00295   glColor4f(1,1,1,1);
00296   glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00297   glDisable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00298   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00299 }
